sn22.6:4.2: “Paṭisallāṇe, bhikkhave, yogamāpajjatha.
sn22.6:4.3: Paṭisallīṇo, bhikkhave, bhikkhu yathābhūtaṃ pajānāti.
sn22.6:4.5: Rūpassa samudayañca atthaṅgamañca, vedanāya samudayañca atthaṅgamañca, saññāya samudayañca atthaṅgamañca, saṅkhārānaṃ samudayañca atthaṅgamañca, viññāṇassa samudayañca atthaṅgamañca … pe …
